Learn more about me
Introduction Hi, my name is Piotr Jabłoński and this is my website. I frequently go by "Permito" or "Depermitto", and you can find my work here. I’m a 3rd year CS student at PW in Poland. This blog is a compendium of my thoughts and stuff I think is worth sharing to the world, enjoy!
My face jumpscare This pic was taken in Germany
